channel.title: [pi] help [pi]
channel.description: hi im new to coding pi servers been coding mine pretty good , wanted to know how to make it so admins cant trade what file it would be in or link me to a guide please.

item.title: [pi] help [pi]
item.dc:creator: @ilegalpvp ilegalpvp
item.description:
@ilegalpvp wrote:

[quote=“peterjc, post:1, topic:378309”]hi im new to coding pi servers been coding mine pretty good , wanted to know how to make it so admins cant trade
what file it would be in or link me to a guide please.[/quote]
that would be in trade.java… heres the code if you want

if(c.playerRights >= 2 && !c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("yournamehere")) { c.sendMessage("Trading as staff has been disabled."); return; }

if you want it ONLY for admins it would be == 2, but thats for admins +

Read full topic
